original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 11.7. Kusalattika, Dassanattikādi
analyzed: kusalattika dassanattika ādi

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bhāvanāya pahātabba

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke

original: nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: nava pe a vigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ nabhāvanāya
analyzed: na kusalam na dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na bhāvanāya

original: pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa
analyzed: pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa

original: …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ….
analyzed: na kusalam na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ naācayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na ācaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa ārammaṇe sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekavīsa

original: Nakusalaṁ naapacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Sabbattha sattarasa. Vipākaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na kusalam na neva ācaya gāminā apacaya gāmim dhammam paṭicca sabbattha sattarasa vipākam natthi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naasekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na sekkham dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na asekkham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nanevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… āsevane nava …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na nevasekkha nāsekkham dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe āsevane nava pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā sattarasa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate sattarasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na parittam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā sattarasa pe vipāke nava pe avigate sattarasa

original: Nakusalaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na appamāṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa

original: Nakusalaṁ naparittārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ namahaggatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakusalaṁ naappamāṇārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na paritta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na mahaggata ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca pe na kusalam na appamāṇa ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
